title: The Firebrand
description: This is a re-telling of the legend of the fall of Troy as seen through the eyes of Kassandra, daughter of Priam, Priestess of Apollo, and foreseer of the future. It is written by the author of "The Mists of Avalon", "The Catch Trap", "Night's Daughter" and "Lythande".
author: Marion Zimmer Bradley
